person.content:
Please identify the "Person" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Person". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Person |
| --- |
| est |
| 6,000 |
| 346,000 |

The entities in the paragraph are:

* est (which is an abbreviation for "estimated")
* 6,000 (which is a numerical value)
* 346,000 (which is a numerical value)

Note that these entities are not names of specific people, but rather numerical values and an abbreviation.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Person" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Person".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Person |
| --- |
| est |

The only entity that clearly refers to a person in the paragraph is "est", which is an abbreviation for "estimated". The other numerical values (6,000 and 346,000) do not clearly refer to a person and therefore are not included in the table.
